title: Change pod's image to nginx:1.24.0. Observe that the container will be restarted as soon as the image gets pulled
description: Change pod's image to nginx:1.24.0. Observe that the container will be restarted as soon as the image gets pulled

steps: 2. kubectl describe po nginx # you will see an event 'Container will be killed and recreated'
3. kubectl get po nginx -w # watch it
